description: a(n) = (F(n+1)+L(n)+n)^2 where F(n) are the Fibonacci numbers (A000045) and L(n) are the Lucas numbers (A000032).
links: Colin Barker, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (7,-16,7,23,-28,-3,17,-4,-3,1).
prog: (PARI) lucas(n) = if(n==0, 2, fibonacci(2*n)/fibonacci(n))a(n) = (fibonacci(n+1)+lucas(n)+n)^2 \\ _Colin Barker_, Apr 24 2015(PARI) Vec(-(4*x^9-8*x^8+36*x^7-115*x^6+86*x^5+70*x^4-162*x^3+130*x^2-54*x+9) / ((x-1)^3*(x+1)*(x^2-3*x+1)*(x^2+x-1)^2) + O(x^100)) \\ _Colin Barker_, Apr 24 2015(PARI) a(n)=(fibonacci(n-1)+2*fibonacci(n+1)+n)^2 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Apr 24 2015
author: _Mohammad K. Azarian_
